data.actual_result: Sometimes it will flash the one you selected, flash the one you had previously selected and go back to the correct one
data.expected_result: It will change it accordingly to what you picked smoothly
data.short_description: Privacy and Safety has a bulky and brute animation
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Privacy & Safety - Click on any of the first 3 options and keep on clicking them and changing them  - Make sure to not spam only 2 and rather change it between them
